datafield.subfield: Modeling and simulation-based systems engineering handbook /
editors, Daniele Gianni, Andrea D'Ambrogio, Andreas Tolk.

Introduction to the modeling and simulation-based systems engineering handbook / Daniele Gianni, Andrea D'Ambrogio, and Andreas Tolk -- Systems engineering, architecture, and simulation / Andreas Tolk and Taylor K. Hughes -- System modeling : principled operationalization of social systems using Presage2 / Sam Macbeth, Dídac Busquets, and Jeremy Pitt -- Formal agent-based models of social systems / Il-Chul Moon -- On the evolution toward computer-aided simulation / Luiz Felipe Perrone -- Model-driven method to enable simulation-based analysis of complex systems / Paolo Bocciarelli and Andrea D'Ambrogio -- Collaborative modeling and simulation in spacecraft design / Volker Schaus, Daniel Lüdtke, Philipp M. Fischer, and Andreas Gerndt -- Performance engineering of distributed simulation programs / Giuseppe Iazeolla and Alessandra Pieroni -- Reshuffling PDES platforms for multi/many-core machines : a perspective with focus on load sharing / Francesco Quaglia, Alessandro Pellegrini, and Roberto Vitali -- Layered architectural approach for distributed simulation systems : the SimArch case / Daniele Gianni -- Reuse-centric simulation software architectures / Olivier Dalle -- Conceptual models become alive with Vivid OPM : how can animated visualization render abstract ideas concrete? / Dov Dori, Sergey Bolshchikov, and Niva Wengrowicz -- Processes to support the quality of M&S artifacts / Jan Himmelspach and Stefan Rybacki -- Formal validation methods in model-based spacecraft systems engineering / Joost-Pieter Katoen, Viet Yen Nguyen, and Thomas Noll -- Modeling and simulation framework for systems engineering / Saikou Diallo, Andreas Tolk, Ross Gore, and Jose Padilla -- Liquid business process model collections / Wil M.P. van der Aalst, Marcello La Rosa, Arthur H.M. ter Hofstede, and Moe T. Wynn -- Web-based simulation using Cell-DEVS modeling and GIS visualization / Sixuan Wang and Gabriel Wainer.
Access restricted to authorized users and institutions.
